pages.text: $(li)Compasses are useful for travelers, they are always pointing to the Spawnpoint.$(br)$(li)You can change the place that is pointing it with a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/lodestone)Lodestone$(/l).

$(li)The Compass can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/soul_compass)Soul Compass$(/l), $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l), or a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/map)Map$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)Cartographers will exchange your Compass by Emeralds.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/cartographer)Masters Cartographers$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) and Compass by a $(l:patchouli:tools/castle_in_the_sky/levitation_stone)Levitation Stone$(/l).
